ABOUT PACMON:
 Pacmon is a game inspired by the
 classic game pacman. The original
 design, concept and names are
 copyright of NAMCO.
 Pacmon is NOT the original pacman
 game and does not provide a similar
 gaming experience. The source code
 are available under MIT license
 free of charge. You can contact
 the author to gain source code.
 Game artwork is copyright of pacmon
 and Game sounds are taken from
 freesound.org under the Creative
 Commons License by user Timbre

SUPPORT:
 email us: pacmon.info@gmail.com

HOW TO PLAY:
 User control pacmon using accelerometer.
 Tilt left to move Pacmon left.
 Tilt right to move Pacmon right.
 Tilt up to move Pacmon up.
 Tilt down to move Pacmon down.

 MultiPlayer
 Two device must be connected
 to WiFi inorder to play against each
 other. One device should be
 the server and another one should
 be the client.
